snippet.title: Mugsters - Fails Trailer (Steam, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Mugsters will be available on Steam (PC and Mac), PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch on July 17th 2018! Steam wishlist: bit.ly/MugstersSteam

Official website: https://www.team17.com/games/mugsters/
Follow Mugsters on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MugstersGame
Like Mugsters on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mugstersvideogame/
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Join the conversation on Discord: http://discord.gg/team17

Saving humanity isn't an easy task. You're bound to fail. And fail a lot. We just wanted to let you know, that you're not the only one!

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info. 
bit.ly/SubTeam17

About Reinkout Games
Mugsters is Riku Tamminen’s first commercial game since signing onto Team17’s incubation programme. He has a history of making mobile games and Mugsters’ success began with fantastic engagement on Twitter.
